entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:03 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
